content.prompt: The United States House of Representatives responded to abolitionist agitation in the 1830s by

choices.label: approving appropriations to help finance colonization efforts
prohibiting the slave trade in the District of Columbia
limiting the publication of abolitionist writings to certain publishers
considering the passage of free speech laws to protect outspoken abolitionists

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
